description_for_model: Kids Call Home is a safe, family-only video calling and messaging app for children. It enables kids to call parent-approved family members without needing a SIM card or phone number. Works on tablets, iPads, and Wi-Fi devices. Features include: full parent control over contacts, international calling support, encrypted communication, no ads, no tracking, COPPA compliant, co-parenting friendly, and works across countries. Target audience: parents with children ages 5-17, co-parents, long-distance families, international families.
description_for_human: Safe video calling and messaging app for kids. Family-only contacts controlled by parents. Works without SIM card or phone number. International calling support. COPPA compliant.
